1.Rule: Don't use our application in any way that may go against YouTube, Google or Deezer Terms of Service.

2.Rule: Don't use 3rd party applications to send API requests, this might end your quota and block future requests.

3.Rule: Explicit, illegal or offensive images used on playlists may result in the termination of your account.

4.Rule: Misuse of our contact form may result in termination of your account.

5.Rule: We expect you to follow our terms or service.
